content.json: >**NOTE:** This workbook depends on a parser based on a Kusto Function to work as expected [**Corelight**](https://aka.ms/sentinel-Corelight-parser) which is deployed with the Microsoft Sentinel Solution.

parameters.name: Sensor
parameters.label: Corelight Sensor
parameters.query:
corelight_conn
| distinct sensor_name
| sort by sensor_name

content.title: Sensor Events Timechart
Sensor Events Count

content.query:
let QueryResults = ((corelight_notice
| where ('*' in ({Sensor}) or system_name in ({Sensor}))
//| where note != "LongConnection::found" and note != "SSL::Invalid_Server_Cert"
//| project-rename Alert = note 
| union corelight_suricata_corelight)
| where ('*' in ({Sensor}) or system_name in ({Sensor}))
//| where alert_category != "Not Suspicious Traffic" and alert_category != "Attempted Information Leak" and alert_category != "Potentially Bad Traffic"
//| where _path_s == "notice"
//| project-rename Alert = alert_category
| extend
    Category = coalesce(note, alert_category),
    Alert = coalesce(msg, alert_signature),
    Severity=coalesce(severity_level, alert_severity, 7.),
    Type = path
| extend PartitionKey = case(path == "suricata_corelight", Alert, Category)
| where (isnotempty(uid) or isnotempty(community_id))
| partition hint.strategy=native by PartitionKey
    (
    top 10 by TimeGenerated
    )
| order by Severity asc, TimeGenerated
// hack to hide empty columns
| evaluate narrow()
| where isnotempty(Value) and Value != "##(null)" or Column == "_system_name_s"
| evaluate pivot(Column, any(Value), Row)
);
let QueryCount=QueryResults
| summarize count()
| project count_;
let NoResults = datatable(TimeGenerated: string , Type: string , Category: string, Alert: string, Severity: string, uid: string, id_orig_h: string, id_resp_h: string, id_resp_p: string )[];
union isfuzzy=true
(QueryResults| where toscalar(QueryCount) != 0),
(NoResults| where toscalar(QueryCount) == 0)
| project-reorder
    TimeGenerated,
    Type,
    Category,
    Alert,
    Severity,
    uid,
    id_orig_h,
    id_resp_h,
    id_resp_p
content.title: Recent Events Summary (10 most recent per message type)

content.query:
union Corelight_v2_*_CL
| where ('*' in ({Sensor}) or _system_name_s in ({Sensor}))
| where (isnotempty("{Selected_uid}") and (uid_s == "{Selected_uid}" or conn_uids_s contains_cs "{Selected_uid}"))
| top 300 by TimeGenerated
// hack to hide empty columns
| evaluate narrow()
| where isnotempty(Value) and Value != "##(null)" or Column == "_system_name_s"
| evaluate pivot(Column, any(Value), Row)
| project-reorder TimeGenerated, _path_s, id_orig_h_s, id_resp_h_s, id_resp_p_d, _system_name_s
| project-away Row
content.title: Related paths (select in Events Summary)

content.query:
corelight_suricata_corelight
| where ('*' in ({Sensor}) or system_name in ({Sensor}))
| summarize alert_count=count() by source_ip=id_orig_h, alert_signature, severity=alert_severity
| top 10 by alert_count
content.title: Suricata Top Alerts by Source

parameters.label: Service
parameters.query:
let pre_services = datatable(service: string) [
    "dce_rpc",
    "dhcp",
    "dns",
    "ftp",
    "gssapi,smb,krb",
    "http",
    "krb_tcp",
    "ntp",
    "smb",
    "smb,gssapi,ntlm",
    "smb,ntlm,gssapi",
    "smtp",
    "ssh",
    "ssl",
    "xmpp,ssl",
    "vxlan",
    "dce_rpc,gssapi,ntlm,smb",
    "dce_rpc,smb",
    "dnp3_tcp",
    "ftp-data",
    "gssapi",
    "gssapi,ntlm,smb",
    "gssapi,smb",
    "http,socks",
    "imap",
    "irc",
    "irc-dcc-data",
    "mqtt",
    "rdp",
    "smb,gssapi",
    "socks",
    "ssl,ftp",
    "ssl,socks",
    "ssl,xmpp",
    "xmpp",
    "ftp,ssl",
    "ntlm,gssapi,smb",
    "ntlm,gssapi,smb,dce_rpc",
    "smb,dce_rpc",
    "socks,http",
    "ssl,smtp",
    "bacnet",
    "ntlm,smb,gssapi",
    "smtp,ssl",
    "gssapi,smb,ntlm",
    "gssapi,dce_rpc,ntlm,smb",
    "smb,dce_rpc,gssapi,ntlm",
    "socks,ssl",
    "ntlm,dce_rpc,gssapi,smb",
    "ntlm,dce_rpc,smb,gssapi",
    "gssapi,ntlm,dce_rpc,smb",
    "smtp/ssl",
    "xmpp/ssl"
];

corelight_conn
| where ('*' in ({Sensor}) or sensor_name in ({Sensor}))
| project service 
| union pre_services
| where isnotempty(service)
| extend service_list = split(service, ",")
| mv-expand service = service_list
| distinct tostring(service)
| sort by tostring(service) asc

content.query:
corelight_conn
| where ('*' in ({Sensor}) or sensor_name in ({Sensor})) 
       and (('*' == ('{id_orig_h}') or id_orig_h == ('{id_orig_h}')) )
       and (('*' == ('{id_orig_p}') or id_orig_p == ('{id_orig_p}')) )
       and (('*' == ('{id_resp_h}') or id_resp_h == ('{id_resp_h}')) )
       and (('*' == ('{id_resp_p}') or id_resp_p == ('{id_resp_p}')) )
| where is_broadcast != "true" 
| search '{AdditionalFilter}'
| extend service_array = split(service, ",")
| mv-expand service = service_array
| where ('*' == ('{service}') or service == ('{service}'))
| extend service = coalesce(service, "unknown")
| summarize Count = count() by service
| top 10 by Count
content.title: Top Services

content.query:
corelight_conn
| where ('*' in ({Sensor}) or sensor_name in ({Sensor})) 
       and (('*' == ('{id_orig_h}') or id_orig_h == ('{id_orig_h}')) )
       and (('*' == ('{id_orig_p}') or id_orig_p == ('{id_orig_p}')) )
       and (('*' == ('{id_resp_h}') or id_resp_h == ('{id_resp_h}')) )
       and (('*' == ('{id_resp_p}') or id_resp_p == ('{id_resp_p}')) )
| where is_broadcast != "true"
| search '{AdditionalFilter}'
| extend service_array = split(service, ",")
| where ('*' == ('{service}') or (array_index_of(service_array, ('{service}')) != -1))
| extend id_resp_p = toint(id_resp_p)
| extend id_resp_p = coalesce(tostring(id_resp_p), "unknown")
| summarize Count = count() by tostring(id_resp_p)
| top 10 by Count
content.title: Top Responder Ports

content.query:
corelight_conn
| where ('*' in ({Sensor}) or sensor_name in ({Sensor})) 
       and (('*' == ('{id_orig_h}') or id_orig_h == ('{id_orig_h}')) )
       and (('*' == ('{id_orig_p}') or id_orig_p == ('{id_orig_p}')) )
       and (('*' == ('{id_resp_h}') or id_resp_h == ('{id_resp_h}')) )
       and (('*' == ('{id_resp_p}') or id_resp_p == ('{id_resp_p}')) )
| where is_broadcast != "true"
| extend service_array = split(service, ",")
| mv-expand service = service_array
| extend service = coalesce(service, "unknown")
| where service == ('{service_top}')
| search '{AdditionalFilter}'
| extend tunnel_parents = strcat_array(todynamic(tunnel_parents), ", "), suri_ids = strcat_array(todynamic(suri_ids), ", "), apps = strcat_array(todynamic(apps), ", "),
         app = strcat_array(app, ", "), id_orig_h_n_vals = strcat_array(todynamic(id_orig_h_n_vals), ", "),
         id_resp_h_n_vals = strcat_array(todynamic(id_resp_h_n_vals), ", ")
| project-away $table, service_array
content.title: Details of Service: {service_top}

content.query:
corelight_conn
| where ('*' in ({Sensor}) or sensor_name in ({Sensor})) 
       and (('*' == ('{id_orig_h}') or id_orig_h == ('{id_orig_h}')) )
       and (('*' == ('{id_orig_p}') or id_orig_p == ('{id_orig_p}')) )
       and (('*' == ('{id_resp_h}') or id_resp_h == ('{id_resp_h}')) )
       and (('*' == ('{id_resp_p}') or id_resp_p == ('{id_resp_p}')) )
| where is_broadcast != "true"
       and direction == "outbound"
| search '{AdditionalFilter}'
| extend service_array = split(service, ",")
| where ('*' == ('{service}') or (array_index_of(service_array, ('{service}')) != -1))
| summarize  proto = make_set(proto), Bytes = sum(orig_bytes) by id_orig_h, id_resp_h
| top 10 by Bytes
| extend ipinfo = geo_info_from_ip_address(id_resp_h)
| extend Country = tostring(ipinfo.country)
| extend Protocol = strcat_array(proto, ", ")
| project ["Source IP"] = id_orig_h, ["Destination IP"] = id_resp_h, Country, Bytes, Protocol
content.title: Top Outbound Data Flows by Originator (id_orig_h) Bytes

content.query:

content.query:
let dummy_table = datatable(uid_s: string, TenantId: string, SourceSystem: string, MG: string, ManagementGroupName: string, Computer: string, RawData: string, _ResourceId: string)[];

union Corelight*, dummy_table
| where uid_s == '{open_uid}'
| project-away TenantId, SourceSystem, MG, ManagementGroupName, Computer, RawData, _ResourceId
content.title: Details of UID: {open_uid}

parameters.name: ResponderPort
parameters.label: Responder Port (id_resp_p)
parameters.query:
let DNSPorts = datatable(
        id_resp_p: real
    )[
        137,
        53,
        5353,
        5355
    ];
union DNSPorts, (corelight_dns
| where ('*' in ({Sensor}) or sensor_name in ({Sensor})))
| where isnotempty(id_resp_p)
| distinct id_resp_p
| extend port_number = tostring(toint(id_resp_p))
| lookup _GetWatchlist('CorelightDNSPortDesc') on port_number
| summarize arg_max(LastUpdatedTimeUTC, *) by port_number
| extend label = iff(isnotempty(description),strcat(description, " (", port_number, ")"), port_number)
| project id_resp_p, label
| sort by label asc

parameters.name: RecordType
parameters.label: Record Type
parameters.query:
let DNSLookup = datatable(
        record_type: string
    )[
        "A",
        "AAAA",
        "CNAME",
        "MX",
        "NB",
        "NULL",
        "PTR",
        "SRV",
        "TXT",
        "AXFR",
        "CAA",
        "DNSKEY",
        "NS",
        "SOA",
        "query-38712"
    ];
union DNSLookup, (corelight_dns
| where ('*' in ({Sensor}) or sensor_name in ({Sensor})))
| where isnotempty(record_type)
| distinct record_type
| sort by record_type asc

content.query:
corelight_dns
| where ('*' in ({Sensor}) or sensor_name in ({Sensor}))
| where ('*' == ('{RecordType}') or record_type == ('{RecordType}'))
| where ('*' == ('{ResponderPort}') or id_resp_p == ('{ResponderPort}'))
| search '{AdditionalFilter}'
| where is_broadcast != "true"
| summarize Sum = count() by record_type
| top 10 by Sum
| project RecordType = coalesce(record_type, "unknown"), Sum
content.title: Top Query Types

content.query:
let interval_in_hrs= datetime_diff('hour', {GlobalTimeRestriction:end}, {GlobalTimeRestriction:start});
let interval_in_days= datetime_diff('day', {GlobalTimeRestriction:end}, {GlobalTimeRestriction:start});
let bin_duration=case(interval_in_hrs<=24, 1h, interval_in_days<=30, 1d, interval_in_days>=31 and interval_in_days<=90, 7d, 31d);
corelight_dns
| where ('*' in ({Sensor}) or sensor_name in ({Sensor}))
| where ('*' == ('{ResponderPort}') or id_resp_p == ('{ResponderPort}'))
| where ('*' == ('{RecordType}') or record_type == ('{RecordType}'))
| search '{AdditionalFilter}'
| where record_type != "ptr" and is_broadcast != "true"
| make-series Sparkline = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {GlobalTimeRestriction:start} to {GlobalTimeRestriction:end} step bin_duration by query
| extend Count = array_sum(Sparkline) 
| top 10 by Count
| project Query = coalesce(query, "unknown"), Sparkline, Count
content.title: Top 10 Queries by Count

content.query:
let interval_in_hrs= datetime_diff('hour', {GlobalTimeRestriction:end}, {GlobalTimeRestriction:start});
let interval_in_days= datetime_diff('day', {GlobalTimeRestriction:end}, {GlobalTimeRestriction:start});
let bin_duration=case(interval_in_hrs<=24, 1h, interval_in_days<=30, 1d, interval_in_days>=31 and interval_in_days<=90, 7d, 31d);
corelight_dns
| where ('*' in ({Sensor}) or sensor_name in ({Sensor}))
| where ('*' == ('{ResponderPort}') or id_resp_p == ('{ResponderPort}'))
| where ('*' == ('{RecordType}') or record_type == ('{RecordType}'))
| search '{AdditionalFilter}'
| where record_type != "ptr" and reply_code == "NXDOMAIN" and is_broadcast != "true"
| make-series Sparkline = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {GlobalTimeRestriction:start} to {GlobalTimeRestriction:end} step bin_duration by query
| extend Count = array_sum(Sparkline) 
| top 10 by Count
| project Query = coalesce(query, "unknown"), Sparkline, Count
content.title: Top 10 Queries by Count to Non-Existent Domains

content.query:
corelight_files 
| where is_broadcast != "true" and
        ('*' == ('{Mime_Type}') or mime_type == ('{Mime_Type}')) and
        ('*' in ({Sensor}) or sensor_name in ({Sensor}))
| search '{AdditionalFilter}'
| extend NetworkDirection = case(
    is_src_internal_ip == "true" and is_dest_internal_ip == "false", "sent",
    is_dest_internal_ip == "true" and is_src_internal_ip == "false", "received",
    is_dest_internal_ip == "true" and is_src_internal_ip == "true", "internal",
    "unknown"
)
| make-series ["Files Sent"] = countif(NetworkDirection=="sent"),
              ["Files Received"] = countif(NetworkDirection=="received"),
              ["Files Internal"] = countif(NetworkDirection=="internal"), 
              ["Files Unknown"] = countif(NetworkDirection=="unknown") 
              on TimeGenerated from {GlobalTimeRestriction:start} to {GlobalTimeRestriction:end} step {GlobalTimeRestriction:grain} by NetworkDirection
content.title: File Flow - # of Files

content.query:
corelight_files
| where is_broadcast != "true" and
        ('*' == ('{Mime_Type}') or mime_type == ('{Mime_Type}')) and
        ('*' in ({Sensor}) or sensor_name in ({Sensor}))
| search '{AdditionalFilter}'
| extend NetworkDirection = case(
    is_src_internal_ip == "true" and is_dest_internal_ip == "false", "sent",
    is_dest_internal_ip == "true" and is_src_internal_ip == "false", "received",
    is_dest_internal_ip == "true" and is_src_internal_ip == "true", "internal",
    "unknown"
)
| make-series ["Bytes Sent"] = sumif(bytes, NetworkDirection=="sent"),
              ["Bytes Received"] = sumif(bytes, NetworkDirection=="received"),
              ["Bytes Internal"] = sumif(bytes, NetworkDirection=="internal"), 
              ["Bytes Unknown"] = sumif(bytes, NetworkDirection=="unknown") 
              on TimeGenerated from {GlobalTimeRestriction:start} to {GlobalTimeRestriction:end} step {GlobalTimeRestriction:grain} by NetworkDirection

content.query:
let interval_in_hrs= datetime_diff('hour', {GlobalTimeRestriction:end}, {GlobalTimeRestriction:start});
let interval_in_days= datetime_diff('day', {GlobalTimeRestriction:end}, {GlobalTimeRestriction:start});
let bin_duration=case(interval_in_hrs<=24, 1h, interval_in_days<=30, 1d, interval_in_days>=31 and interval_in_days<=90, 7d, 31d);

corelight_conn
| where ('*' in ({Sensor}) or sensor_name in ({Sensor}))
| where isnotempty(id_orig_h) and
        service == "http"
| search '{AdditionalFilter}'
| make-series Sparkline = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {GlobalTimeRestriction:start} to {GlobalTimeRestriction:end} step bin_duration by id_orig_h
| extend Count = array_sum(Sparkline)
| project ["Source IP"] = id_orig_h, ["Originator Over Time"] = Sparkline, Count
| top 10 by Count
content.title: Top Originators

content.query:
let interval_in_hrs= datetime_diff('hour', {GlobalTimeRestriction:end}, {GlobalTimeRestriction:start});
let interval_in_days= datetime_diff('day', {GlobalTimeRestriction:end}, {GlobalTimeRestriction:start});
let bin_duration=case(interval_in_hrs<=24, 1h, interval_in_days<=30, 1d, interval_in_days>=31 and interval_in_days<=90, 7d, 31d);

corelight_http
| where ('*' in ({Sensor}) or sensor_name in ({Sensor})) and
        ('*' == (```{UserAgent}```) or user_agent == (```{UserAgent}```))
| where isnotempty(host_header) and
        direction in ("inbound", "internal")
| search '{AdditionalFilter}'
| make-series Sparkline = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {GlobalTimeRestriction:start} to {GlobalTimeRestriction:end} step bin_duration by host_header
| extend Count = array_sum(Sparkline)
| project ["Host Header"] = host_header, Count, Sparkline
| sort by Count desc

parameters.name: SoftwareType
parameters.label: Software Type
parameters.query:
let SoftwareTypeLookup = datatable(
        software_type: string
    )[
        "HTTP::APPSERVER",
        "HTTP::BROWSER",
        "HTTP::SERVER",
        "OS::WINDOWS",
        "SMTP::MAIL_CLIENT",
        "SSH::CLIENT",
        "SSH::SERVER",
        "FTP::CLIENT"
    ];
union SoftwareTypeLookup, (corelight_software
| where ('*' in ({Sensor}) or sensor_name in ({Sensor})))
| where isnotempty(software_type)
| distinct software_type
| sort by software_type asc

content.query:
let TotalRecords = (corelight_ssl
| where ('*' in ({Sensor}) or sensor_name in ({Sensor})) and
        ('*' == ('{Direction}') or direction == tolower('{Direction}'))
| search '{AdditionalFilter}'
| extend ['SSL Subject'] = coalesce(ssl_subject, ssl_subject_common_name)
| where isnotempty(['SSL Subject']));
let Total = toscalar(TotalRecords
| count);
TotalRecords
| summarize Count = count() by ['SSL Subject']
| extend Percent = round((Count * 100.0 / Total), 6)
| top 10 by Count
content.title: Top Certificate Subjects

| where ['SSL Subject'] == @'{selected_ssl_subject}'
| extend cert_chain_fps = strcat_array(todynamic(cert_chain_fps), ","), client_cert_chain_fps = strcat_array(todynamic(client_cert_chain_fps), ","), fingerprint = strcat_array(todynamic(fingerprint), ",")

| extend cert_chain_fps = strcat_array(todynamic(cert_chain_fps), ","), client_cert_chain_fps = strcat_array(todynamic(client_cert_chain_fps), ","), fingerprint = strcat_array(todynamic(fingerprint), ",")
| project-away $table
content.title: Details for Validation Status : {validation_status}

content.query:
corelight_ssl
| where ('*' in ({Sensor}) or sensor_name in ({Sensor})) and
        ('*' == ('{Direction}') or direction == tolower('{Direction}'))
| search '{AdditionalFilter}'
| where ssl_cipher == '{ssl_cipher}'
| extend cert_chain_fps = strcat_array(todynamic(cert_chain_fps), ","), client_cert_chain_fps = strcat_array(todynamic(client_cert_chain_fps), ","), fingerprint = strcat_array(todynamic(fingerprint), ",")
| project-away $table

content.query:
let TopSubjects = (corelight_x509
| where ('*' in ({Sensor}) or sensor_name in ({Sensor}))
| search '{AdditionalFilter}'
| where isnotempty(ssl_subject));
let Total = toscalar(TopSubjects
| count
);
TopSubjects
| summarize Count = count() by ssl_subject
| extend Percentage = round((Count*100.0)/Total, 6)
| top 10 by Count
| project-rename ['SSL Subject'] = ssl_subject
